description: Creates a core network Connect attachment from a specified core network attachment. A core network Connect attachment is a GRE-based tunnel attachment that you can use to establish a connection between a core network and an appliance. A core network Connect attachment uses an existing VPC attachment as the underlying transport mechanism.

parameters.name: CoreNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of a core network where you want to create the attachment.

parameters.name: EdgeLocation
parameters.description: The Region where the edge is located.

parameters.name: TransportAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment between the two connections.

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options for creating an attachment. Protocol (string) --- The protocol used for the attachment connection.

nested_params.name: Protocol
nested_params.description: The protocol used for the attachment connection.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The list of key-value tags associated with the request. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token associated with the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ConnectAttachment
nested_items.description: The response to a Connect attachment request.

nested_items.name: Attachment
nested_items.description: The attachment details.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of a core network.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a core network.

nested_items.name: AttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the attachment.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the attachment account owner.

nested_items.name: AttachmentType
nested_items.description: The type of attachment.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the attachment.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocation
nested_items.description: The Region where the edge is located. This is returned for all attachment types except a Direct Connect gateway attachment, which instead returns EdgeLocations.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocations
nested_items.description: The edge locations that the Direct Connect gateway is associated with. This is returned only for Direct Connect gateway attachments. All other attachment types retrun EdgeLocation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The attachment resource ARN.

nested_items.name: AttachmentPolicyRuleNumber
nested_items.description: The policy rule number associated with the attachment.

nested_items.name: SegmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the segment attachment.

nested_items.name: NetworkFunctionGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the network function group.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the attachment.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The tag value.

nested_items.name: ProposedSegmentChange
nested_items.description: The attachment to move from one segment to another.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of key-value tags that changed for the segment.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The tag value.

nested_items.name: AttachmentPolicyRuleNumber
nested_items.description: The rule number in the policy document that applies to this change.

nested_items.name: SegmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the segment to change.

nested_items.name: ProposedNetworkFunctionGroupChange
nested_items.description: Describes a proposed change to a network function group associated with the attachment.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of proposed changes to the key-value tags associated with the network function group.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The tag value.

nested_items.name: AttachmentPolicyRuleNumber
nested_items.description: The proposed new attachment policy rule number for the network function group.

nested_items.name: NetworkFunctionGroupName
nested_items.description: The proposed name change for the network function group name.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the attachment was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the attachment was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastModificationErrors
nested_items.description: Describes the error associated with the attachment request.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code for the attachment request.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error code.

nested_items.description: The ARN of the requested attachment resource.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used for the attachment connection.
